purpose: Share Elias's testimonial about achieving a completely paperless pharmacy workflow with Titan PMR, highlighting how dispensing no longer requires constant pharmacist intervention and empowering the team to do more.
core_message: We had no paper prescriptions today at all… completely paperless. Dispensing without constant pharmacist intervention. Digital, trackable, and clutter-free. A team empowered to do more.
summary: Short testimonial video featuring Elias discussing how Titan PMR enabled a fully paperless workflow, with dispensing that doesn't require constant pharmacist intervention, digital and trackable prescriptions, and a team empowered to work independently.
